text: A full and complete record shall be kept of all proceedings had before the Commission or its agents on any formal investigation had, and all testimony shall be taken down by a stenographer appointed by the Commission.

chapter.text: Rates, Examinations, Investigations, and Hearings. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Record of proceedings to be kept; testimony to be taken stenographically.
